TopicTitle: Mouse Over Not Working for Indicators (PE/AP etc) When Maneuver Node is Open. (Not related to 0.1.0.0 Bug that dropped the pins)

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.1.0.21572
KSP2 Version: 0.1.2.0.22258
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB
Mods Used: None

Expected Behavior:
That the maneuver node can be open or closed for the indicators to show their information when the mouse pointer is over the top of them.
Observed Behavior:
That the maneuver node needs to be closed for the indicators to show their information when the mouse pointer is over the top of them.

Video Evidence:
This shows how it works with the maneuver node closed and how it doesn't work with it open:
https://youtu.be/GHUl771_TO8 (14 Seconds)

Save File from Video:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/d80183y0xlqcr8c/NoIndicatorPopupBugTestSave.zip?dl=0

Additional Information:
Does the same in 0.1.1.0

 

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
